capability_gate.description: Pre-step feasibility check determining if AI can execute directly, needs delegation, or if task is infeasible

source_credibility.description: Procedure for evaluating the credibility and reliability of any information source

skill_benchmarking.description: Identify quality standards, benchmark current skill level, and design deliberate practice to close gaps

procedure_engine.description: GOSM Procedure Engine - Automatic routing and chaining based on QUICKSTART flow. Handles goals, problems, questions, decisions, situations, and feelings.

probabilistic_reasoning.description: Systematic procedure for estimating probabilities, updating beliefs with evidence, and making well-calibrated predictions

code_review.description: Procedure for conducting effective code reviews that improve quality and share knowledge

learning_system.description: Systematically capture, analyze, and apply learnings to improve campaign effectiveness

salary_negotiation.description: Systematic approach to negotiating job offers that maximizes total compensation

backward_reasoning.description: Reasoning from conclusions back to premises. Given a conclusion, what journey led here? Reveals purpose and enables evaluation.

araw.description: Assume Right / Assume Wrong search - The core exploration method. For every claim, branch into what follows if true vs what alternatives exist if false.

uaua.description: Universalize → ARAW → Universalize → ARAW. Combined exploration method that maps complete possibility space (divergent) then validates (convergent). Supports depth scaling: 2x, 4x, 8x, 16x.

job_search_strategy.description: Systematic approach to job hunting that treats the search as a funnel to optimize,

email_acquisition.description: Acquire and configure email addresses for autonomous system operations

session_review.description: Capture learnings at end of session for continuous improvement. Reviews what worked, what did not, surprises, and procedure gaps.

finder.description: Find the right GOSM skill for what you want to do. Describe your need in plain language and get matched to the best skill(s).

assumption_audit.description: Surface and rigorously test a field's hidden assumptions. Compound skill chaining extraction, inversion, research, ARAW, cross-domain analogy, and synthesis.

decision_procedure.description: Create a mechanical step-by-step decision procedure anyone can follow without expertise. Compound skill chaining dimension discovery, enumeration, assumption extraction, steps generation, failure anticipation, and validation.

adversarial_checklist.description: Create a checklist that catches what normal checklists miss. Each item includes adversarial branches testing what if assumptions are wrong.

cross_domain_report.description: Discover what one field can learn from another through structural analogies, transferability testing, and actionable synthesis.

field_analysis.description: Comprehensive analysis of a field's key tensions, hidden assumptions, blind spots, and health. The most thorough single-field analysis available.

visual_design_principles.description: Eight principles of visual design derived from first principles (cognitive load, gestalt perception, reading research). Use as a gate before any visual design work.

aw.description: Assume Wrong - Deep recursive wrongness search. Assume a claim is wrong, find why, find alternatives, then assume THOSE are wrong too. Recurse until bedrock. Supports depth scaling: 1x-32x.

ar.description: Assume Right - Deep recursive rightness search. Assume a claim is right, find what follows, find commitments, then assume THOSE are right too. Recurse until bedrock. Supports depth scaling: 1x-32x.

u.description: Universalize - Extract the complete space of assumptions, dimensions, and alternatives from any claim. Pure exploration — map before you judge. Supports depth scaling: 1x-32x.

generate.description: Diverse candidate production. Produce actual artifacts (code, prose, layouts), not labels. Required diversity: conventional, unconventional, extreme.

design.description: Universal design principles. Constrained optimization of arrangement for comprehension, task completion, and signal value. Includes domain effort orderings and the arbitrary decision test.

critique.description: Impression-first evaluation. State impression, identify standard, analytical decomposition, divergence check, actionable verdict. Severity: structural/significant/minor/polish.

unexpected.description: Find non-obvious solutions. Three layers — obvious, unexpected, reframed — using disruption techniques that force the search off its default path. 10 disruption techniques available.

propose.description: Convert analysis findings into steelmanned, actionable plans with conditional recommendations. Every recommendation includes a derivation chain. Requires a source analysis from /ar, /aw, /u, /araw, or /uaua.

sbfow.description: Still Bad, Figure Out Why - Self-diagnosis when output was rejected. Systematically test which criteria the output failed against.

foht.description: Figure Out How To - Method discovery when you know WHAT but not HOW. Map the method space, test candidates, find approaches that survive scrutiny.

fowwr.description: Figure Out What Went Wrong - Backward causal diagnosis of failures. Trace from symptom to root cause, test each candidate cause.

wantto.description: I Want To - Goal parsing and decomposition. Unbundle the want, find what they actually need, map the path space, route to the right next step.
